Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to your endeavors. Considering its true worth and the impact it can have on your business, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the return on my investment and ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
